name: Elbow Plank Leg Lift
desc: Place your forearms on the floor with your elbows under your shoulders. Ground your toes into the floor and engage your abs, shouldes, back, and glutes to stabilize the body. Be careful not to lock or hyperextend your knees. While keeping your core engaged, slowly raise your left leg off the floor until itâ€™s at about hip height. Keep a straight spine with your head in line with your back and look at a spot on the floor slightly above your hands.
